title: The City of Pellacata with its Castle
marks:
Title and Inscription

URC in the print and plat top center in the plate: [The City of PELLACATA wi
description: view of village with houses and other buildings, with a road around the periphery of village; harbor with boats at top; dark-skinned people in foreground--travelers in a caravan, a group of shepherds with cows and goats and a group of people surrounding two figures hanging on a gallows and another figure kneeling in a type of torture device (?)
